info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:35PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Queens, Bronx, Kings, New York (Manhattan) and northwestern Nassau Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 534 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brooklyn Heights, or near Crown Heights, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jamaica, Flushing, Glen Cove, Garden City, Mineola, Westbury, Great Neck, Crown Heights, Throgs Neck Bridge, Midtown Manhattan, RFK Bridge, Laguardia Airport, Jackson Heights, Forest Hills and Astoria. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
